mapper.select: SELECT no, contents, memberNo, views, regdate, r FROM(SELECT no, contents, memberNo, views, regdate, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, contents, member_no memberNo, views, regdate FROM boards WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY regdate)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

select no, contents, memberNo, nickname, views, regdate, likeCount, commentCount from (select b.no, b.contents, m.no memberNo, m.nickname, views, b.regdate regdate, NVL(l.likeCount,0) likeCount, NVL(c.commentCount,0) commentCount from boards b, members m, (select post_no, count(*) likeCount from likes where type = 'B' group by post_no) l, (select board_no, count(*) commentCount from comments group by board_no) c where m.no = b.member_no AND l.post_no = c.board_no(+) AND b.no = l.post_no(+))
